text: André Bourvil was a French actor and singer. He was born with the name André Robert Raimbourg. He is best known for his roles in comedy movies. He worked with Louis de Funès in the movies Le Corniaud (1965) and La Grande Vadrouille (1966). He won a Special Diploma at the 4th Moscow International Film Festival. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:1970 deaths Category:Deaths from bone cancer Category:French movie actors Category:French comedians
title: Bourvil
